resources.string: Since 1992 we have managed to connect our brand with affordable prices and high quality.

"The Perivolaraki family history lies from the beginning of 1900. In 1930 K.Perivolarakis, the grandfather of the family who grew his own flowers which he later sold at the market. The current generation, Goerge kept on cultivating flowers, until 1992 when along with his wife opened up their first florist shop, named Narkissos, which is run by her son, Constantine Perivolarakis the junior. "
F l o w e r S y n t h e s i s
